item.title: CVE-2024-0219|2024-01-31T16:47:14.050Z -- Progress Software -- Telerik JustDecompile
item.description: In Telerik JustDecompile versions prior to 2024 R1, a privilege elevation vulnerability has been identified in the applications installer component.Â In an environment where an existing Telerik JustDecompile install is present, a lower privileged user has the ability to manipulate the installation package to elevate their privileges on the underlying operating system.
